form.titleEn: Transportation Safety Board of Canada general enquiries
form.titleFr: Renseignements généraux Bureau de la sécurité des transports du Canada

brand.name: tsb-bst
brand.logoTitleFr: Bureau de la sécurité des transports du Canada

endPage.descriptionEn:
# Transportation Safety Board of Canada ## Thanks, we got your message We'll send you an email copy of your message shortly. **Someone from our office will contact you in the next 7 days.** If you don't get a response within 7 days, you can contact our office directly or by phone. Our office hours are 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Eastern, Monday to Friday.
  • General enquiries: 1-800-387-3557
  • Media relations: (819) 994-8053
If you're finished, you can [navigate back to the homepage](https://www.tsb.gc.ca/eng/contactez-contact/index.html)
endPage.descriptionFr:
# Bureau de la sécurité des transports du Canada ## Merci, nous avons reçu votre message Nous vous enverrons sous peu une copie de votre message par courriel. **Notre personnel vous contactera dans les 7 prochains jours.** Si vous n'obtenez pas de réponse avant les prochains jours, vous pouvez nous contacter directement par téléphone. Nos heures de bureau sont de 8 h 00 à 16 h 30 heure de l'Est, du lundi au vendredi.
  • Renseignements généraux: 1-800-387-3557
  • Relations avec les médias: 819-994-8053
Si vous avez terminé, vous pouvez [retour à la page d'accueil](https://www.tsb.gc.ca/fra/contactez-contact/index.html)

properties.descriptionEn: The Transportation Safety Board of Canada can answer your questions about our organization, the status of our investigations, and incidents related to air, rail, marine, and pipeline. To contact us, please fill out the form below.
properties.descriptionFr: The Transportation Safety Board of Canada can answer your questions about our organization, the status of our investigations, and incidents related to air, rail, marine, and pipeline. To contact us, please fill out the form below.

properties.titleEn: What kind of information do you need?
properties.titleFr: What kind of information do you need?
properties.descriptionFr: Cocher tous les choix qui s’appliquent

choices.en: Air, marine, oil, or pipeline incident
choices.fr: Air, marine, oil, or pipeline incident

choices.en: Investigation status or lab report request
choices.fr: Investigation status or lab report request

choices.en: Other, such as jobs and training, photos or videos, pilot background letter
choices.fr: Other, such as jobs and training, photos or videos, pilot background letter

properties.descriptionEn: If you selected Other in the previous question
properties.descriptionFr: If you selected Other in the previous question

properties.descriptionEn: Any relevant details or specific questions
properties.descriptionFr: Any relevant details or specific questions

choices.en: I would like to receive daily notifications for air updates
choices.fr: I would like to receive daily notifications for air updates
